items.sentence: How many years has it been since you\'ve had a girlfriend?
I really don\'t think that Tom did that, but maybe he did.
Tom was too busy to notice any change in Mary\'s behavior.
Tom wasn\'t allowed to visit his father who was in prison.
Tom opened the door quietly, so he wouldn\'t wake Mary up.
Tom decided then and there to never let this happen again.
Tom told me that he doesn\'t like to study in the morning.
Tom and Mary said they\'ve each had three glasses of wine.
We used to think that was why this kind of thing happened.
One of Tom\'s sons is married to one of Mary\'s daughters.
